issue.title: [R][Documentation] Add a vignette on using dplyr and the compute kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13836](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13836). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
User guide to dplyr and the compute kernels (using base functions, using stringr/lubridate etc. versions, calling the arrow_ kernels directly)
